channel.title: Blogs on Chathuranga's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Chathuranga's Blog

item.title: Welcome to machine age...!!!
item.description: As we are Living in a most exciting time in history, we are very much fortunate to use the amazing technologies that would be considered as only exists in science fictions few decades back. This happens because of the fast advancement of artificial intelligence which has been severely blew up the tech world. Many tech giants around the world believe that machine learning is the next big thing and they dive into their new breakthroughs using machine learning heavily.

item.title: About
item.description: Chathuranga Lakmal Rajapaksha Software Engineer, AI and Machine Learning Researcher I am very passionate about following topics, Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning Deep Learning You can find my projects and contribute on GitHub. Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to ask. Thanks for reading! Happy Coding!!!

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you want to contact me, you can send me an e-mail Social media I am on socail media and we can discuss there: Twitter LinkedIn Google+
